api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Provide the token (API Key) of the Llama Parse server

url.title: URL
url.description: Provide the Base URL of llama Parse server.

result_type.title: Result Type
result_type.description: Choose the type of result. Markdown or text.

num_workers.title: Number of Workers
num_workers.description: Used for multiple files to split the API calls between the workers.

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: If set, verbose result is included.

language.title: Language
language.description: Optionally you can define a language, default=en
